testcase.purpose: Test that the UA retains the changes made to the storage on subsequent initializations.

description.pre_condition: Make sure au.wgt is installed with the command : pkgcmd -i -t wgt -q -p TESTER-HOME-DIR/content/tct/opt/tct-wgtapi02-w3c-tests/widgetinterface/w3c/au.wgt
description.post_condition: Get the $pkgid of au.wgt with the command : pkgcmd -l, then uninstall the au.wgt with the command : pkgcmd -u -t wgt -q -n $pkgid

step.step_desc: Get the $appid of au.wgt with the command : app_launcher -l, launch au.wgt with the command : app_launcher -s $appid
step.expected: The screen shows "Please close the widget and open it again" on gray background.

step.step_desc: Restart au.wgt application.
step.expected: The screen shows "PASS" on green background.

testcase.purpose: Test that, upon invocation of the clear() method, a user agent queues a task to fire a StorageEvent event at the window object of an iframe contained by the start file.

description.pre_condition: Make sure clear-fires-event.wgt is installed with the command : pkgcmd -i -t wgt -q -p TESTER-HOME-DIR/content/tct/opt/tct-wgtapi02-w3c-tests/widgetinterface/w3c/clear-fires-event.wgt
description.post_condition: Get the $pkgid of clear-fires-event.wgt with the command : pkgcmd -l, then uninstall the clear-fires-event.wgt with the command : pkgcmd -u -t wgt -q -n $pkgid

step.step_desc: Get the $appid of clear-fires-event.wgt with the command : app_launcher -l, launch clear-fires-event.wgt with the command : app_launcher -s $appid
step.expected: The screen shows "PASS" on green background.

testcase.purpose: Test that upon getting any of the attributes from the attributes column of the configuration attributes table, a user agent must return the corresponding value from the 'Values in Table of Configuration Defaults' column.

description.pre_condition: Make sure return-emtpy-strings.wgt is installed with the command : pkgcmd -i -t wgt -q -p TESTER-HOME-DIR/content/tct/opt/tct-wgtapi02-w3c-tests/widgetinterface/w3c/return-emtpy-strings.wgt

step.step_desc: Get the $appid of return-emtpy-strings.wgt with the command : app_launcher -l, launch return-emtpy-strings.wgt with the command : app_launcher -s $appid
step.expected: The screen shows "PASS" on green background.
